query: SELECT r.id, r.title, r.description, COUNT(DISTINCT i.id) as ingredient_count, COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) as step_count FROM recipes r LEFT JOIN ingredients i ON r.id = i.recipeId LEFT JOIN steps s ON r.id = s.recipeId WHERE r.id = 90011 GROUP BY r.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2qMKsjcyrEcxoLm.304ecbf98555 --database 9ymjkyaifDC9XAdAUefdKw --execute SELECT r.id, r.title, r.description, COUNT(DISTINCT i.id) as ingredient_count, COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) as step_count FROM recipes r LEFT JOIN ingredients i ON r.id = i.recipeId LEFT JOIN steps s ON r.id = s.recipeId WHERE r.id = 90011 GROUP BY r.id;
